content: उद्भास् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> To shine. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To light up, illuminate, render beautiful, decorate; ornament; उद्भासितं मंगलसंविधाभिः <ls>R. 7. 16</ls>; काले घनोद्भासिते <ls>Mk. 5. 35.</ls> {@--2@} (<ab>fig.</ab>) To bring into prominence, elevate, exalt; उद्भासिताखिलखलस्य <ls>Bh. 2. 59.</ls>
